name: Who Gonna Do It
description:
You have a list of things to do at a party, but someone there is trying to kill you. Roam carefully without getting killed.

There are a few laggy areas and bugs in the game which I did not have enough time to fix, but other than that, enjoy!

Drago (me) - coding

Ello - art

Skransow - music

(p.s. I know balloon is misspelled in the game, I cannot update/fix it right now though)
